metadata.title: CVE-2023-0138 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in libphonenumber in Google Chrome prior to109.0.5414.74 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
